attributes.action: Lower the cervical screening test to 18
attributes.background: To lower the cervical screening age to 18 from 25, as a lot of women below the age of 25 have suffered and are suffering. They haven’t received treatment as it was too late by the time they found out because they couldn’t receive a screening at 18.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574513
